About ZenTrust

About ZenTrust

🌿 About ZenTrust

“What if healing the land was the same as healing ourselves?”
ZenTrust is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit building living systems for regeneration — not just of soil, but of society, spirit, and story.

🌱 Purpose

In a world fractured by disconnection, we believe regeneration begins with trust —
in nature, in community, in the self.
ZenTrust exists to:
  • Reforest degraded lands using syntropic agroforestry
  • Revive wellness using Bio-Psycho-Social-Spiritual (BPSS) principles
  • Train a new generation in sacred technology & ecological design
  • Fund decentralized impact through DAO governance and Web3 tools

🔭 Vision

We imagine a world where:
  • 🍃 Sustainability isn’t the goal — regeneration is
  • 🧘🏽‍♂️ Every person is supported by an ecosystem of healing
  • 🛖 Wellness sanctuaries are co-governed by the people they serve
  • 🌐 Land, code, and care are open-source and community-owned

🌀 What We Do

  • Build food forest sanctuaries and learning labs
  • Create healing environments rooted in BPSS health
  • Share wisdom through open-source media, retreats, and workshops
  • Design future-proof infrastructure for DAOs, dWeb, and regenerative tech
ZenTrust is not a brand.
It is a seed — held by those restoring trust in what is sacred.
